channel.title: Mama Elephant on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Mama Elephant on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Perfectly CAS #30*
item.description: Happy Monday crafty friends! I am playing along with the challenge at Perfectly CAS today that wants to see a CAS card with embossing. I love the look of a hint of dry embossing on my creations and my first thought was to add a little sweater texture to a Christmas card. I embossed an entire panel and used this strip for this card and the rest on the card I posted yesterday.

item.title: *Time Out Challenges #221*
item.description: It’s time for a new challenge at Time Out Challenges with a wonderful prize from Birch Press Designs to be won!! I hope you’ll play along, sharing your FESTIVE cards!! I know that Festive can refer to a lot of different things, but to me, festive is Christmas… so I made a Christmas Card using a product I bought at the end of the season last year and hadn’t yet played with.

item.title: *Christmas Craft Creations August*
item.description: There’s still time to play along with the latest challenge at Christmas Craft Creations! I sure hope you’ll play along! My winter activity is playing in the snow…. you can see I had fun building an igloo and decorating it! In reality, I had more fun playing with my Glimmer Hot Foil Machine to create my snowy background LOL! Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Smokey Slate *Images: Mama Elephant Merry Greetings; MFT Polar Penguins
